title: By the King, a proclamation of general pardon to all seamen, mariners and others imployed at sea
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall the 23rd day of December, in the 24th year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
